name: UNAuthorizationOptions
desc: Constants for requesting authorization to interact with the user.

items.name: static var badge: UNAuthorizationOptions
items.desc: The ability to update the appâ€™s badge.

items.name: static var carPlay: UNAuthorizationOptions
items.desc: The ability to display notifications in a CarPlay environment.

items.desc: The ability to play sounds for critical alerts.

items.name: static var providesAppNotificationSettings: UNAuthorizationOptions
items.desc: An option indicating the system should display a button for in-app notification settings.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Initializes an authorization options constant using the specified raw value.
